articles.description: The Lionesses will become the first England side since 1966 to win a senior final on the global stage if they defeat Spain at Stadium Australia in Sydney on Sunday.
articles.title: England v Spain World Cup final: What you need to know

articles.description: England forward Billy Vunipola is sent off as Ireland secure a major momentum boost before the World Cup by scoring five tries in a comfortable win.
articles.title: Vunipola sent off as Ireland beat England in Dublin

articles.description: Defending champions Manchester City remind their title rivals they remain the team to beat by seeing off a determined Newcastle side.
articles.title: Alvarez gives slick Man City win against Newcastle

articles.description: England have to "play the game of our lives" if they are to win the Women's World Cup, says captain Millie Bright.
articles.title: England have to play 'game of our lives' - Bright

articles.description: Watch as Great Britain win silver in the 4x400m mixed relay final after Netherlands' Femke Bol falls in the final few yards at the World Athletics Championships.
articles.title: 'What drama!' GB take relay silver after Netherlands fall

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou's Tottenham showed promise for the post-Harry Kane era against Manchester United, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Postecoglou's Spurs show promise in life after Kane

articles.description: BBC Sport pundits Alex Scott, Fara Williams and Ellen White discuss whether Lauren James should be recalled to England's starting line-up for the Women's World Cup final against Spain.
articles.title: Should James start? - Pundits on World Cup final

articles.description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp believes Alexis Mac Allister's red card should be rescinded, arguing his side has been "punished enough" by the dismissal.
articles.title: 'Punished enough' - Klopp wants red card rescinded

articles.description: Great Britain win mixed 4x400m relay silver at the World Championships as Katarina Johnson-Thompson puts herself in heptathlon gold-medal contention.
articles.title: GB win relay silver as Johnson-Thompson eyes gold
